title: Poison Master

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Use a poison on another player each night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When using a poison, you may choose to poison your target, poison them, or poison them. Each choice has a two-night cooldown unless you have the Necronomicon. Each cooldown ends when you gain the Necronomicon.
- You have three poison choices: the first deals a Basic attack and kills your target in one night, the second deals a Powerful attack and kills your target in two nights, and the third deals an Unstoppable attack and kills your target in three nights.
- At the end of the night that a player you poisoned would die, they will die if they would have died if you dealt an attack that would have killed them on the night you poisoned them.
- Poisoning counts as an attack.
- Your targets will learn they were poisoned.
- With the Necronomicon, your poisons cannot be healed.
- You are immune to effects that would alter how your targetâ€™s role appears to investigative effects.
